duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform Aluminum MIG and TIG welding processes in a manufacturing environment.
Interpret and understand weld symbols and testing requirements.
Adhere to proper safety instructions and guidelines regarding welding operations.
Collaborate with the team to achieve project goals and deadlines.
Perform other duties as assigned by supervision.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or GED, or related experience as a certified structural steel welder determined by the plant manager.
